DOC.brief_summary: Assess pancreatic beta cell function using MR imaging.
DOC.brief_title: The Aim is to Estimate the Total Amount of Insulin-producing Cells in the Pancreas by MRI.
DOC.detailed_description: The study was terminated on July 31st, 2007. The study was discontinued, as we have not met the primary end point, differentiation between normal volunteers and subjects with type 1 diabetes mellitus. There were no safety concerns.
DOC.criteria: Normal Volunteers T1DM and T2DM subjects Concomitant severe conditions
